rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {PRM1511} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: This unit builds on knowledge acquired in PRM1511, and offers further development and refinement of conceptual and practical skills acquired in PRM1511 Artists' Books. The unit investigates the form of the book, considering the role of the artist book as a mode of distribution, and the roles of text, image, sequence and temporality in the artist book. It provides students with the means to extend already established skills in a variety of typesetting and printmedia processes, and a consideration of their works in the context of contemporary visual art.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
